critique: The executive order aims to convey a sense of joy and surprise. Joy because it is promoting equal opportunity and combating age discrimination, leading to a more positive and inclusive work environment. Surprise because the order introduces a new policy that prohibits age discrimination in federal contracts, which may be unexpected for some. There might be a tinge of sadness because it acknowledges that age discrimination exists, but the overall tone is more positive and forward-looking. There is no indication of fear or disgust.
